name: Murder In The Dark
description:
Murder In The Dark

Game is inspired by the Mandela Catalogue 

You'll need to watch the Mandela Catalogue to fully understand what's going on in this game, but it's still an enjoyable experience if you don't.

CONTROLS: WASD to move and LMB to interact with items

This is a short horror game I made while in quarantine. I spent 6 days on it, but if it gets popular, I might put more time into it. 

If you find any issues please tell me

Thank you
